mapper.sql:
where status != '-1'
and ( qy like '%${keyword}%' or md like '%${keyword}%' or dz like '%${keyword}%' or fr like '%${keyword}%' or dh like '%${keyword}%')
and qy like '%${qy}%'
and md like '%${md}%'
and dz like '%${dz}%'
and fr like '%${fr}%'
and dh like '%${dh}%'
and status = #{status}
mapper.select: select id,qy,md,dz,fr,dh,bz,addTime,status from dz_cwmzyy where status != '-1' order by id desc
select id,qy,md,dz,fr,dh,bz,addTime,status from dz_cwmzyy order by ${orderby} limit #{start_num,,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{page_size,,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id,qy,md,dz,fr,dh,bz,addTime,status from dz_cwmzyy where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dz_cwmzyy( id, qy, md, dz, fr, dh, bz, addTime, status ) values( #{id}, #{qy}, #{md}, #{dz}, #{fr}, #{dh}, #{bz}, #{addTime}, #{status} )
mapper.update: update dz_cwmzyy set qy=#{qy}, md=#{md}, dz=#{dz}, fr=#{fr}, dh=#{dh}, bz=#{bz}, addTime=#{addTime}, status=#{status} where id=#{id}
update dz_cwmzyy set status = #{status} where id in (${ids})
update dz_cwmzyy set status = '-1' where id in (${ids})
